name: Michelle K.
comment: Really ! modern cars let you use the clutch and move forward without using the throttle. But in neutral with hand brake off they will roll on a slope. I tell a Automatic though, because there.

name: John M.
comment: First let me congratulate you on this excellent, easy to understand/follow bit on the issue of driving a stick shift car. Learning to drive a manual transmission car requires a certain level of seriousness.
